div.div:
/proc/$pid/cwd/.attach_pid$ns_pid
or
/proc/$pid/root/tmp/.attach_pid$ns_pid
or
/tmp/.attach_pid$ns_pid
🔗
💡: ns_pid is "inner most" namespaced PID

div.div:
3. check :
- File exists
- 当那个文件 owner uid 和 JVM 进程的 uid 是一致的情况下（为了安全）
